resources.string:
Hi, my name is Sean. 

I like to draw, read, watch film, take photos, buy clothes, and play video games. 

I draw people so I can create characters, draw people I see, and create clothing for them 
I buy a lot of old expensive clothes, it is a problem 

I am into art and literature of all kinds. 
I read and watch a lot of content that I become obsessed with. If I am into something I REALLY get into it. 

Gaming wise I have only really been playing Genshin Impact but I used to compete in FPS games 

I have been trying to learn how to be more proficient with film cameras and Japanese 

If we have any common interests be my friend.
